title: historical college
review: campus is very good and i feel like wish i study at this place, those who studied here are so fortunate that they famous india name all round the world.

title: A must see
review: The british era building is a eye treat and classic example of british era achitecture. Its difficult to get permission to see it though otherwise worth a visit for architect enthusiast.

title: Note to the Editors.
review: St. George's College is a boarding boys school in Mussoorrie. It is neither a restaurant, hotel, resort or anything of that sort. Its not a place for tourists to visit. In my opinion it should not be listed on Tripadvisor. Please feel free to get in touch with me if you need any more info regarding the review.

title: A great school to learn.
review: This purely boys college in Mussoorie more than 100 years old, is among the three most prestigious educational institutions. Affiliated to ICSE New Delhi it imparts education up to ISC (Class XII) in all streams.  It believes in all round development of student's personality. Nice college to choose for early education of your son.

title: Excellent Boarding School
review: A very Famous Boarding School which has produced many many famous and well Reached Individuals to India like retd DGP Punjab k P S Gill etc.

title: Character and work
review: Excellent boarding school for boys in the lap of nature. Beautiful and huge campus to watch. Faculty takes lot of pains for students.

title: nice boarding school
review: school is good but it is not an attraction. my nephew studied here and it is normal a school. what you will see here but really school is very great.

title: Scenic campus
review: Scenic campus amongst greenery attracts boys around the vicinity to study in this college. The costs are subsidized for some sections of the society and it follows ICSE standard

title: What will you see in a school?
review: You can see the gates of the school and recall the old movies Jo Jeeta Wahi Sikandar and hum pehla nasha. What else can you do outside the gates of the school?

title: Prestegious college
review: St. George's College is  in Barlowganj, about 6 kilometers from Mussoorie. It is a  premier boarding school for boys.  Founded in 1853, it is affiliated to the ICSE council.  This college has produced many important personalities of India.  There is a grand clock tower in the school, a museum showing history of the school,  indoor gymnasium, a well-stocked library, a multi-functional auditorium, and indoor heated swimming pool. There is a synthetic open-air tennis court. Hockey, cricket, and football are popular. Indoor sports are played throughout the year. The Annual Sports Day is a very important day of the school.

title: Premier Institute
review: St. George's College is a premier boarding school for boys in Barlowgunj, 6 kilometers from  Mussoorie, and 20 Kilometers from Dehradun, India. It is affiliated to the ICSE council. It was founded in 1853.  There is a grand clock tower in the school which was built in 1936. This college has produced many important personalities occupying top posts in Army, Air force, Politics, Literature, Science, Films, Drama, etc.

title: British Era
review: Very old and one of the best in the country, If you need to live like ruskin bond this place will give you the feel. An awesome school a the top of the hill.

title: Amazing School
review: I visited here when I was in School. It's indeed one of the best Schools. The Food in the Mess, the Dormitories, Buildings, Playground and the Mountain Views were just amazing. Completely loved the week long stay here.

title: Beautiful location for a great school
review: Been there a couple of times. A very beautiful building and location. It is certainly worth a visit if they let you in. The colonial architecture is very attractive.

title: A great school in a prime location
review: You can only visit with a prior appointment.

title: THE BEST!
review: It is one of the most reputed schools in the entire country. They transform your kid into an all-rounder. I have studies there and I must say that 'It Is The Best Thing That Has Ever Happened To Me'. It is also one of the oldest schools in the country. It was built in 1853.
